name: Molly
description: Molly is an energetic and intelligent Border Collie who loves to play and learn new tricks. She enjoys being active and is very affectionate with people.

name: Tucker
description: Tucker is a friendly and loyal Golden Retriever who enjoys outdoor adventures and spending time with his family. He’s gentle and great with kids.

name: Max
description: Max is a spirited Shiba Inu with a bold personality. He’s independent, alert, and loves exploring while still being affectionate with his favorite people.

name: Charlie
description: Charlie is a gentle giant with a calm and loving nature. Despite his size, he is patient, affectionate, and enjoys relaxing with his family.

name: Oscar
description: Oscar is a playful and strong-willed Bull Terrier who loves being the center of attention. He’s energetic, curious, and thrives with an active lifestyle.

name: Lola
description: Lola is a cheerful young Cocker Spaniel full of energy and charm. She’s affectionate, loves to play, and is always eager to please.

name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a lively Irish Terrier with a big heart. Brave and full of spirit, he’s both a loyal companion and a fun-loving adventurer.

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a strong and alert Doberman Pinscher who is protective yet affectionate. He’s intelligent, loyal, and thrives with good training and exercise.

name: Rex
description: Rex is a powerful Cane Corso with a protective nature. Confident and loyal, he makes a devoted guardian while being gentle with his loved ones.

name: Toby
description: Toby is a sweet-natured Bernese Mountain Dog who adores companionship. He’s gentle, affectionate, and happiest when surrounded by family.

name: Duke
description: Duke is a calm and loyal Shar Pei with a distinctive look. He’s dignified, affectionate with his family, and enjoys quiet companionship.

name: Nala
description: Nala is a curious and playful Beagle with a keen nose for adventure. She’s friendly, energetic, and loves exploring her surroundings.
